reference.title: mktime : convert time to arithmetic representation

section.title: Description
section.p: mktime assumes the time at timp is a local time, and converts its representation from the traditional representation defined by struct tm into a representation suitable for arithmetic.
localtime is the inverse of mktime.

section.title: Returns
section.p: If the contents of the structure at timp do not form a valid calendar time representation, the result is -1. Otherwise, the result is the time, converted to a time_t value.
